languages.text: "Это — наживка, которой враг поманит тебя, заставляя приближаться. Шаг за шагом. Будь осторож{mf|ен|на}, элантах — может, намерения твои и благи, но дорога, по которой они ведут — опасна".

traits.locale_text: "Это — наживка, которой враг поманит тебя, заставляя приближаться. Шаг за шагом. Будь осторож{mf|ен|на}, эл'антар — может, намерения твои и благи, но дорога, по которой они ведут — опасна".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."
languages.original_text: "Это — наживка, которой враг поманит тебя, заставляя приближаться. Шаг за шагом. Будь осторож{mf|ен|на}, элантах — может, намерения твои и благи, но дорога, по которой они ведут — опасна".

traits.locale_text: "It is the bait the enemy is luring you with, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, el'antar — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is the bait the enemy is luring you with, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, el'antar — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

traits.locale_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这是敌人引诱你的诱饵，诱使你慢慢走过去，一步又一步。要警惕，外界人。或许你的意图是高尚的，但这会让你走上危险的道路。”
languages.original_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

traits.locale_text: “这是敌人引诱你的诱饵，诱使你慢慢走过去，一步又一步。要警惕，外界人。或许你的意图是高尚的，但这会让你走上危险的道路。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

languages.text: «Es el cebo con el que te atrae el enemigo, tentándote a acercarte más. Paso a paso. Cuidado, elantach: aunque tus intenciones sean nobles, te están llevando a un camino peligroso».
languages.original_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

traits.locale_text: «Es el cebo con el que te atrae el enemigo, tentándote a acercarte más. Paso a paso. Cuidado, elantach: aunque tus intenciones sean nobles, te están llevando a un camino peligroso».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「あれは敵がお前をおびき寄せ、近かせるための餌だ。一歩、また一歩と。用心しろ、エランタ。お前の意図は崇高かもしれないが、それはお前を危険な道に向かわせようとしている」
languages.original_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは敵がお前をおびき寄せ、近かせるための餌だ。一歩、また一歩と。用心しろ、エランタ。お前の意図は崇高かもしれないが、それはお前を危険な道に向かわせようとしている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist der Köder, mit dem der Feind Euch lockt, Euch dazu bringt, näher zu kommen. Schritt für Schritt. Seid auf der Hut, Elantach — Eure Absichten mögen edel sein, doch sie schicken Euch auf eine gefährliche Straße."
languages.original_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist der Köder, mit dem der Feind Euch lockt, Euch dazu bringt, näher zu kommen. Schritt für Schritt. Seid auf der Hut, Elantach — Eure Absichten mögen edel sein, doch sie schicken Euch auf eine gefährliche Straße."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est aussi l'appât que l'ennemi utilise pour vous attirer, vous inciter à vous approcher. Pas à pas. Méfiez-vous, elantach. Aussi nobles que soient vos intentions, elles vous conduisent sur une route bien dangereuse. »
languages.original_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

traits.locale_text: « C'est aussi l'appât que l'ennemi utilise pour vous attirer, vous inciter à vous approcher. Pas à pas. Méfiez-vous, elantach. Aussi nobles que soient vos intentions, elles vous conduisent sur une route bien dangereuse. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Düşmanın aklını çeldiği, ona daha da yaklaşman için seni teşvik eden bir yem bu. İlk adımın ardından ikinci de gelir. Dikkatli ol elantach. Yüreğinde asil bir niyet taşısan da bu niyet, seni çok tehlikeli bir yola sürüklüyor."
languages.original_text: "It is the bait with which the enemy lures you in, urging you to come closer. One step after another. Be wary, elantach — your intentions may be noble, but they are sending you down a dangerous road."

traits.locale_text: "Düşmanın aklını çeldiği, ona daha da yaklaşman için seni teşvik eden bir yem bu. İlk adımın ardından ikinci de gelir. Dikkatli ol elantach. Yüreğinde asil bir niyet taşısan da bu niyet, seni çok tehlikeli bir yola sürüklüyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
